subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Coach Jay Gruden said he had not determined whether Colt McCoy, Robert Griffin III or Kirk Cousins would start on Sunday, when Washington brings its 3-10 record to visit the Giants.
snippet: Coach Jay Gruden said he had not determined whether Colt McCoy, Robert Griffin III or Kirk Cousins would start on Sunday, when Washington brings its 3-10 record to visit the Giants.
